org.assertj.swing.fixture

Class FontFixture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.fixture.FontFixture

  • public class FontFixture
extends Object
    Verifies the state of Fonts.
    Author:
    Yvonne Wang, Alex Ruiz

public FontFixture requireFamily(@Nonnull
                                          String family)
        Verifies that the family name of this fixture's font is equal to the given one.
        Parameters:
        family - the expected family name.
        Returns:
        this assertion object.
        Throws:
